constituent: hug, finger, fingers, mysterious, top hat, cocoon, turkey
heisigStory: Fingers . . . mysterious . . . turkey. Note that the top hat is extended across both elements, though it belongs only to the cocoon. This means that you may either use mysterious - as we did here - or take the three elements separately.
koohiiStory1: A mysterious turkey with human fingers wants to hug me... I will never go to Tokyo Disneyland again!
koohiiStory2: Imagine Gandalf hugging a turkey....ouch! It bit off his finger!
